objects.name: Analytic 0242
objects.description: Defender detects execution of `mdfind`, `launchctl`, or GUI-based enumeration (e.g., `/Applications/Time Machine.app`) along with command-line usage of `find`, `grep`, or `system_profiler` to identify installed backup tools like Time Machine, Carbon Copy Cloner, or Backblaze. Often triggered from Terminal sessions or within post-exploitation scripts.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Process execution logs showing discovery commands like mdfind, system_profiler, or launchctl list

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Read access to Time Machine plist files or CCC configurations in ~/Library/Preferences/

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Directories or bundles where backup tools are commonly installed
Plist files related to backup software configurations
